name: Vape PRO Simulator Joke
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Vape.
Vape the PRO simulator joke - this is a game application simulator Vape electronic cigarette as a joke! Feel the smoke out of the screen, show your friends that you have a fashionable thing! It's very funny and cool!
Feel like a hipster!
If you have a beard and a scarf, but no Vape? - It does not matter, our application will help you fix it!
Completely replaces a cigarette or other tobacco product!
It will help you to quit the habit to smoke in real life!
You will love it! Choose Weipa, according to your taste.
Do you want to buy, but do not know which one to choose? Download and try our simulator!
ATTENTION! This is only a simulator! The game was created for the mischief and fun!
The app does not bear any harm to it only emulator, unlike a real electronic cigarette! Smoking is bad for your health!
Raffle friends and loved ones, pretend that you have Bailey!
Thank you for playing with us, leave us your ratings and reviews, and we will try to make our app even better and more interesting for you!
